animeDescription: The anime adaptation of the four-panel manga "Ai Mai Mii".  The story follows girls in a manga club—Ai, Mai, Mii, and Ponoka-senpai—who might be fighting evil invaders threatening Earth, facing off against rivals in tournaments, and dealing with other absurd situations when they are not drawing manga.  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Ai Mai Mii', 'Choboraunyopomi Gekijou Dai Ni Maku Ai Mai Mii: Mousou Catastrophe']
